verses.verse: When <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H74>Abner<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> became <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> were <S%H926>troubled.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> who were <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H1416>bands:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1196>Baanah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> (for <S%H881>Beeroth<s%> also is <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%>
and the <S%H886>Beerothites<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1664>Gittaim,<s%> and have lived as <S%H1481>foreigners<s%> there until this <S%H3117>day<s%>).

Now <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> had a <S%H1121>son<s%> who was <S%H5223>lame<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> He was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when the <S%H8052>news<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> out of <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> and his <S%H539>nurse<s%> took him <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled:<s%> and it <S%H2648>happened,<s%> as she made haste to <S%H5127>flee,<s%> that he <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and became <S%H6452>lame.<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4648>Mephibosheth.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> and <S%H1196>Baanah,<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> about the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H378>Ishbosheth,<s%> as he <S%H7901>took<s%> his <S%H4904>rest<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>

They came <S%H935>there<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> as though they would have <S%H3947>fetched<s%> <S%H2406>wheat;<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> him in the <S%H2570>body:<s%> and <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> and <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>

Now when they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> as he <S%H7901>lay<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed<s%> in his <S%H2315>bedroom,<s%> they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and killed <S%H5493>him,<s%> and beheaded <S%H3947>him,<s%> and took his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> all <S%H3915>night.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H378>Ishbosheth<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7218>"Behold,<s%> the head of <S%H378>Ishbosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> your <S%H341>enemy,<s%> who <S%H1245>sought<s%> your <S%H5315>life!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>has<s%> <S%H5360>avenged<s%> my <S%H3068>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and of his <S%H2233>seed.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> and <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of all <S%H6869>adversity,<s%>

when someone <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>me,<s%> 'Behold, Saul is <S%H4191>dead,<s%>' thinking to have <S%H5869>brought<s%> good <S%H1319>news,<s%> I <S%H5869>took<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H2026>him,<s%> and killed him in <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> which was the reward I <S%H5414>gave<s%> him for his <S%H1309>news.<s%>

How much <S%H7563>more,<s%> when wicked <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H2026>slain<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed,<s%> shall I not now <S%H1245>require<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and take you <S%H1197>away<s%> from the <S%H776>earth?<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H7112>them,<s%> and cut off their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and hanged them <S%H8518>up<s%> beside the <S%H1295>pool<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%> But they <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H378>Ishbosheth,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> it in the <S%H6913>grave<s%> of <S%H74>Abner<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>
